name: Tower Survivors
description:
For the full story, also play Tower Escape!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2009860/Tower_Escape/

The Story

The evil Necromancer has escaped the tower, and overrun the kingdom with their vile minions! You are the last surviving elf in the kingdom, and they will hunt you down as long as you live.

All hope is, however, not lost! Collect gold to summon defenders. Use them to protect the portal, and if you can keep it open for 5 minutes your armies can retake the kingdom and capture the Necromancer again.

Join our Discord to make suggestions or report bugs!
https://discord.gg/2AwK6wmAUh
